definition: to establish/to found/to set up/to build/to construct
to make/to build/to manufacture/to invent/to fabricate/to go to/party (in a lawsuit or legal agreement)/crop/classifier for crops

sentences.english: Residential carpenters erect all types of homes, including apartments and townhouses.
sentences.chinese: 住宅木匠會建造各式各樣的房屋，例如公寓和市政廳。

sentences.english: A large sum of money was spent in building the tower.
sentences.chinese: 建造那座塔花費大量錢財。

sentences.english: But developers have little incentive to build less-profitable units for low-income households.
sentences.chinese: 但開發商不願爲低收入家庭建造低利潤的單元房。

sentences.english: China builds the Bird's Nest, while Hong Kong renovates the racecourse.
sentences.chinese: 中國建造鳥巢，香港改造馬場。
小心圖表建造者創造的幻覺。

sentences.english: Banks are not lining up to lend money on their own for construction of the newest generation of Indian Points.
sentences.chinese: 銀行不會自願貸款給新一代印點核電站的建造。

sentences.english: Is a wall of rammed earth durable?
sentences.chinese: 用乾打壘建造的土牆結實嗎？

sentences.english: My daughter Eliot performed a supervisory role during the construction
sentences.chinese: 我女兒Eliot在建造過程中起監工的作用。

sentences.english: The money collected was used to build a statue of Zeus at the entrance to the stadium .
sentences.chinese: 在體育館入口處，人們用這些罰款建造一尊宙斯像。

sentences.english: Houmpheng says the Chinese-built railway can help the country overcome its isolation.
sentences.chinese: 洪屏說中國建造的鐵路能幫助國家克服封閉。

sentences.english: James: This is an extremely hostile and very difficult environment to build a landscape.
sentences.chinese: 對於建造一個景觀來說，這是一個非常艱困的環境。

sentences.english: In which year was the Istana built?
The Sukhoi SU-22 is a robust and effective Soviet built ground attack aircraft.
sentences.chinese: 蘇22是前蘇聯建造的一種威力強大的對地攻擊戰機。

sentences.english: I looked upon the Nile and raised the pyramids above it.
sentences.chinese: 我仰望尼羅河，在那上面建造金字塔。

sentences.english: It was decided to buttress the crumbling walls.
sentences.chinese: 人們決定建造扶壁以支撐崩塌中的牆。

sentences.english: The Great Wall of China is the longest man-made structure ever built.
sentences.chinese: 中國的長城是曾經建造過的最長的人工建築。

definition: to establish/to found/to set up/to build/to construct
to extend (a building, an airport runway etc)
to finish work/to complete a project
to carry out large scale construction
aircraft carrier/CL:艘[sou1]/(coll.) (fig.) sth huge/(like) a whale
